args: First, we need some nourishment.\nLet us visit the nearest beach cafe.
Isn't that a bit of a dive?!\nFor someone of your standing, I mean?
When at the beach, eat like the\nbeach-goers do, I say.
Now, let's see if their curry can live up\nto my standards.
Oh, geez... This could turn ugly real fast.
Agreed. His Excellency adores curry more\nthan anything. If they bring him something\nthat falls below his expectations...
At best, the owner will get a firm scolding.\nAt worst, the beach will be shut down for\ngood!
Let's hope their recipe is up to snuff...
Yes, of course! Come right on—\nPrince Leonidas?!
I would like curry.\nYour best, if you would.
Yes, sir! Right away, sir!\nI'll get right on it!
(Well? Does their cuisine reign supreme?\nOr is their gastronomy a catastrophe?!)
Not bad. But your preparation needs work\nif you hope to satisfy me.
(Oh, geez... This joint—no, this whole\nbeach is done for!)
I beg your forgiveness, Your Excellency!\nPlease, have mercy!
I'd like to borrow your kitchen, if I may.
Huh? Oh, er... By all means.
Here. The trick is in the secret ingredient:\na nut paste.
Wait, really? You can use that in curry?
Indeed. The slight sweetness of the nuts\nwill give the roux an even richer flavor.
I see! I've learned something new today!
...And that's how you make the perfect\ncurry. I take it you wrote that all down?

Yes, of course! Never in my wildest dreams
would I have imagined I'd get culinary
advice from Prince Leonidas himself.
Thank you from the bottom of my heart!
Your thanks are not necessary.\nThe strong are meant to guide the weak.
After this, you should share the recipe\nfor this curry with the other surrounding\nhuts and make it a specialty of this beach.
Not only did he keep his cool—he even\nwent out of his way to teach the owner\nproper curry-making techniques...
His Excellency is being so much\nnicer than usual. I wonder why.
For the record, I can hear you.
A thousand pardons, Your Excellency!\nI was just... You know...!
I do not mean to admonish you. After all,\nmy behavior is indeed outside the norm.
Because this is my personal time.
I am not here as a noble. I am here as\na simple gourmand, and I wished to give\nthe owner some advice on how to improve.
Now, then. I've satisfied my hunger, so\nperhaps I shall see how the water feels.
Hold it, you! Swimming is strictly\noff-limits right n—
PRINCE LEONIDAS?!\nI beg your pardon for my most\nungracious behavior, Your Highness!
I took no offense. More importantly,\nwhy is swimming presently prohibited?
Well, for the past few days, the waves\nhave gotten particularly violent with no\nsign of settling down.
As the caretaker here, I judged the danger\ntoo great. Though it pained me, I had to do\nsomething in the name of public safety.
Hm... Duly noted. I suppose that\ntakes swimming off the table, then.
Yes. Thank you for understanding.\nNow, I must ask that you turn ba—
Huh? B-but you just agreed that\nswimming is not an option.

But we humans need not yield to the laws
of nature. There are more ways to enjoy
the sea than with a breaststroke or a doggy
paddle.
For instance, if we were to make use of\na certain tool...
As I thought. This weather is perfect for\nsurfing.
Conquering larger waves like this makes\nthe challenge all the more worth it!
Incredible! Only someone as amazing\nas Prince Leonidas could ride the waves\nso magnificently!
While that is most impressive...\nDo you see his expression?
That's the first time I've ever seen him\nlook so content.
He really is acting different. I had no idea\nhe was capable of letting loose like that.
Things are so calm now, and he's been\nable to relax on a proper vacation at last.
Finally, he can get the rest his\nmind and body have so deserved.
